SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Calculations based on costs on Certify.com, and on flight distances of busiest flight routes
Assumptions: Weights: Certify source taken collectively as 50% of weight, with 80% of that being attributed to Domestic trips. 20% of Certify's figures are for International trips. EU Stat's figures taken for the remaining 50% as it covers all trips types.
